-	shop	ShopCannonBall	-1,18000:-1,18001:-1,18002:-1,18003:-1,18004:-1,18005:-1,18006:-1,18007:-1,18008:-1,18009:10,1210000:10,1220000:10

prontera,166,188,4	script	กระสุน	84,{
	menu
	"Arrow",-
	,"Bullet",L_Bullet
	,"Shuriken",L_Shuriken
	,"Kunai",L_Kunai
	,"Throw Weapon",L_ThrowWeapon
	,"Cannon Ball",L_CannonBall
	;
	.@variableName$ = "ShopArrow";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Bullet:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopBullet";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Shuriken:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopShuriken";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Kunai:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopKunai";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_ThrowWeapon:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopThrowWeapon";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_CannonBall:
	.@variableName$ = "ShopCannonBall";
	goto L_Confirmation;
	
	L_Confirmation:
	.@shopName$ = .@variableName$;
	callshop .@shopName$,1;
	end;
}
